LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.AdjustX.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Allows you to fine tune the x-position of the zoom window in pixels.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.AdjustY.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Allows you to fine tune the y-position of the zoom window in pixels.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.DefaultImageContainerSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the default nopCommerce image container. The container will be removed and images with Cloud Zoom will be displayed on its place.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.Enable.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set to enable the Cloud Zoom plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.EnableClickToZoom.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set to enable the default zoom when you click on the main image.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.EnablePictureThumbnailsInCarousel
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Picture Thumbnails To Be In JCarousel

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.EnablePictureThumbnailsInCarousel.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set to enable the picture thumbnails to be displayed in a JCarousel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.EnableTint.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enables the Tint property, which allows you to specifify a tint colour which will cover the small image. DOES NOT WORK WITH SOFT FOCUS!!!

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.SelectorOfTheParentElementOfTheCloudZoomWindow
LocaleResource.Value: The selector of the element that will contain the cloud zoom window

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.SelectorOfTheParentElementOfTheCloudZoomWindow.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the element, that will contain the Cloud Zoom window element.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.ShowTitle.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Shows the title tag of the image.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.SmoothMove.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Amount of smoothness/drift of the zoom image as it moves. The higher the number, the smoother/more drifty the movement will be. 1 = no smoothing.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.TouchStartDelay.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Allow normal page touch-scrolling to work when the zoom image take up full device width.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.SoftFocus.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Applies a subtle blur effect to the small image. Set to true or false. DOES NOT WORK WITH TINT!!!

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.TintColor.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies a tint colour which will cover the small image. Colours should be specified in hex format, e.g. '#aa00aa'.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.TintOpacity.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Opacity of the tint, where 0 is fully transparent, and 1 is fully opaque.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.ZoomHeightInPixels.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the height of the zoom window (in pixels).

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.ZoomPosition.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the position of the zoom window relative to the small image. Allowable values are 'left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom', 'inside' (for inner zoom) or you can specifiy the id of an html element to place the zoom window in e.g. 'element1'

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.ZoomAutoInside.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If the page size becomes less than or equal to the specified width (pixels) Cloud Zoom will work in 'inside' mode. Useful for responsive pages.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.CloudZoom.Admin.Settings.ZoomWidthInPixels.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the width of the zoom window (in pixels).

LocaleResource.Name: ActivityLog.EditCloudZoomSettings
LocaleResource.Value: Cloud Zoom settings has been edited.
